function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced local capacity due to travel and work restrictions and lost training opportunities","Impact":"Decreased ability to respond to ongoing conservation needs and potential consequences for biodiversity conservation.","Mitigation":"Utilize remote training opportunities and technology for data collection and sharing under restricted travel conditions.","Technologies":"Remote training tools, data collection and sharing technologies.","People":"Local conservation experts, researchers, and practitioners.","Owner":"Conservation organizations and institutions."},{"Description":"Loss of partnerships","Impact":"Decreased collaboration and cooperation between local and international partners and cross-sector agencies, potentially hindering conservation efforts.","Mitigation":"Establish new partnerships, increase collaboration, and improve communication between stakeholders.","Technologies":"Communication and collaboration tools, partnership management platforms.","People":"Local and international conservation partners, cross-sector agencies.","Owner":"Conservation organizations and institutions."},{"Description":"Interspecies transmission and pandemic risk","Impact":"Potential for disease spread between human and wildlife populations, leading to heightened pandemic risk and negative impact on biodiversity.","Mitigation":"Enhance biosecurity measures, promote One Health approach, and raise awareness of the linkages between conservation, human well-being, and pandemic risk.","Technologies":"Biosecurity technology, health monitoring tools, public health communication platforms.","People":"Conservation practitioners, public health officials, wildlife researchers.","Owner":"Government agencies, conservation organizations, public health institutions."}]}
